verbose_text: In contrast, the NMDA receptor channel containing GluN1 and the glutamate binding subunit GluN2C shows two lower conductance sublevels with frequent direct transitions, reduced permeability of Ca 2+ ions, and less sensitivity to extracellular Mg 2+ blockade [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NMDA receptor channel containing GluN1 and the glutamate-binding subunit GluN2C shows two lower conductance sublevels with frequent direct transitions, reduced permeability of Ca
